alert.note: Alert for Sullivan (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 14 at 10:22PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 115 AM EDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of east Tennessee, including the following county, Sullivan. Portions of southwest Virginia, including the following counties and independent city, City of Bristol, Russell, Scott and Washington. * WHEN...Until 115 AM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1122 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Bristol Tn, Bristol Va, Walnut Hill, Nickelsville, Collingwood, Benhams, Hiltons, Hilander Park, Holston, Fort Blackmore and Harr. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
